page.title: 03FARMING.
page.content: {****THE FARMER'S TALE.***** "My name is Raymond Beech and I farm {Bryn Carrog Farm}which is a mixed farm of about 240 acres with 4 acres of woodland. My four sons help me on the farm , as I helped my father who farmed Bryn Carrog before me.I have been a farmer for 45 years. This farm will be a hundred and nine years old this year(1985).The old farmhouse is over three hundred years old,and two of my sons now live there, but I live in a modern three bedroomed house on the perimiter of the farm yard.At the moment I have seventy dairy cattle on the farm and eight new-born calves.I depend a great deal on my tractors for all the heavy work around the farm, from ploughing to getting the hay and silage in.I enjoy being a farmer because I get plenty of fresh air and the work is always interesting."
